mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store (name, phone, ownerId, openStatus, categoryId, address, buildingManagementNum, createdAt) VALUES(#{name}, #{phone}, #{ownerId}, #{openStatus}, #{categoryId}, #{address}, #{buildingManagementNum}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM store JOIN store_delivery_location as sdl ON store.id = sdl.storeId WHERE sdl.addressCode = #{addressCode}
